PROCESS BEFORE OUTPUT.																																
  MODULE STATUS_0300.																																
  MODULE tc_attrib.																																
*A)																																
  LOOP AT it_pos INTO wa_pos WITH CONTROL tc_pos																																
                                  CURSOR tc_pos-current_line.																																
    MODULE tc_get_lines.																																
    MODULE tc_set_fields.																																
  ENDLOOP.																																
*B)																																
*  LOOP AT it_pos INTO wa_pos WITH CONTROL tc_pos.																																
*    MODULE tc_get_lines.																																
*  ENDLOOP.																																
  MODULE set_cursor_0300.																																
																																
PROCESS AFTER INPUT.																																
  MODULE exit_command_0300 AT EXIT-COMMAND.																																
  MODULE get_cursor_0300.																																
  LOOP AT it_pos.																																
    CHAIN.																																
      FIELD wa_pos-select.																																
      FIELD wa_pos-index.																																
      FIELD wa_pos-icon01.																																
      FIELD wa_pos-idnrk.																																
      FIELD wa_pos-maktx.																																
      MODULE on_maktx ON CHAIN-REQUEST.																																
      FIELD wa_pos-verpr.																																
      FIELD wa_pos-menge1.																																
*      MODULE on_menge1 ON CHAIN-REQUEST.																																
      FIELD wa_pos-verpr1.																																
      FIELD wa_pos-menge2.																																
      FIELD wa_pos-verpr2.																																
      FIELD wa_pos-menge3.																																
      FIELD wa_pos-verpr3.																																
      FIELD wa_pos-extwg.																																
      MODULE on_extwg ON CHAIN-REQUEST.																																
      MODULE tc_modify ON CHAIN-REQUEST.																																
    ENDCHAIN.																																
  ENDLOOP.																																
  MODULE tb_user_command_0300.																																
  MODULE user_command_0300.																																
																																
  PROCESS ON VALUE-REQUEST.																																
  FIELD wa_pos-extwg MODULE on_f4_extwg_help.
